title: Onboard
content: Merchant Onboard for Odero.az. Finish registration, sign a contract and get access to payment methods.

main.title: Tell us about your situation
main.option1: You are a freelance or independent contractor

help.title: Welcome to Odero Onboard Procedure.
help.subtitle: We need an information about your business in order for us to prepare your contract. Please have your business and personal documents ready and nearby.

help.title: Are you the legal representative?
help.subtitle: If so, please provide your contact information at which we can reach you anytime 24/7. Remember, this information will be used to represent your party in the contract.

help.title: What's a VAT?
help.subtitle: VAT Payer* - Value Added Tax Payer. VAT payer is a taxable person registered by the tax authority office as obliged to pay VAT.
help.subtitle2: Legal business name is the name of you business as stated on official documents. Business name is a name you want people to know you by.

main.title: Provide us with contact information for your business

help.title: What if I don't have a website?
help.subtitle: No worries at all! If you sell your product via social media, you can pass a link to your social media accounts.

help.title: Document upload rules!
help.option1: All documents must be in PDF (.pdf) format.
help.option2: Both sides of the document, if exist, must be upload in the same PDF file.
help.option3: Additional documents may be required in the future if the need arises.
